author: Garrey Dawson
method: Heat the butter in a small saucepan. Add the sliced leeks and a splash of boiling water and fry gently for 3-4 minutes, or until the leeks are just tender. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper, then spoon into a bowl and serve.
ingredients: 30g/1oz butter,  2 small leeks, finely sliced,  splash boiling water,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
